mapper.select: select la.id, ci.name as community_name, concat(ri.room_number,',',la.room_id) as room_number, la.`status` as leaseStatus, la.lease_start_date, la.lease_end_date, la.source_type, la.rent from lease_agreement as la left join room_info as ri on la.room_id=ri.id and ri.is_deleted=0 left join community_info as ci on la.community_id=ci.id and ci.is_deleted=0 where la.is_deleted=0

select la.id, la.phone, la.name, la.identification_number, la.community_id, la.room_id, la.lease_start_date, la.lease_end_date, la.lease_term_id, la.rent, la.deposit, la.payment_type_id, la.`status`, la.source_type, la.additional_info, ci.name as community_name, ri.room_number, pt.`name` as payment_type_name, lt.month_count as lease_term_month_count, lt.unit as lease_term_unit from lease_agreement as la left join community_info as ci on la.community_id=ci.id and ci.is_deleted=0 left join room_info as ri on la.room_id=ri.id and ri.is_deleted=0 left join payment_type pt on la.payment_type_id=pt.id and pt.is_deleted=0 left join lease_term as lt on la.lease_term_id=lt.id where la.is_deleted=0
